title: Siemens expands sustainable MV switchgear range - Your Gateway to Power Transmission & Distribution - T&D India
summary: Siemens Smart Infrastructure has launched new and improved medium-voltage switchgear that uses climate-friendly Clean Air insulation, eliminating the need for F-gases. These blue GIS switchgears are designed to support the decarbonization of power grids, reducing carbon footprint throughout their lifecycle.  Siemens has also made significant enhancements to its NXPLUS C24 switchgear, enabling the supply of climate-neutral energy distribution and further enhancing the company's portfolio of sustainable medium-voltage solutions.
product_or_process: 8DAB24 and NXPLUS C24 blue GIS switchgear
likely_naics_codes: ['333415 - Electrical Transmission and Distribution Equipment Manufacturing', '335121 - Electric Power Generation, Transmission and Distribution Equipment Manufacturing', '517110 - Electric Power Generation, Transmission and Distribution', '237110 - Electrical Contractors']
greenwashing: The article does not provide evidence of greenwashing.  Siemens appears to be genuinely focused on developing and manufacturing environmentally friendly products and processes.
